ai-tha-ap145:1.4_0: I grant you the spiritual life
ai-tha-ap145:2.3_0: Having prepared a great deal of camp,
ai-tha-ap145:2.4_0: with the passing away I have died there,
ai-tha-ap145:3.3_0: They wore robes of the middle:
ai-tha-ap145:3.4_0: the fruit of good and bad deeds.
ai-tha-ap145:4.3_0: The Kings fell on the ground.
ai-tha-ap145:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcasikha.
ai-tha-ap145:7.1_0: Third was the third Elder Nun Vessabhū for the third time,
